topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/550d9814636872353ece0100#post_550d9814636872353ece0100
it's a combination of both arrogance and ignorance i commonly see in people that consider themselves to be smarter than average

for example, when i worked at ups i had to ride with my dad's gf home. i hated it, don't like her too much, so when her and her kid were talking about popular psuedointellectual stuff i acted like an idiot just to pass the time

i've noticed that usually once someone that consider themselves smart starts to think you're genuinely an idiot they play upon that to make themselves feel better, while at the same time saying some outlandishly stupid crap themselves once they start doing that

now of course this doesn't apply to everyone, but i see it a fuckin lot
topics.author: 50a843d47f123b2e7c001359
